items.titolo: Nvidia now produces three times as much code as before AI — specialized version of Cursor is being used by over 30,000 Nvidia engineers internally

items.titolo: AI Is Here to Replace Nuclear Treaties. Scared Yet?

items.titolo: Iran’s Digital Surveillance Machine Is Almost Complete
